amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Limited community redevelopment authority; laws applicable.
amendatorysection.para: The provisions of the Community Development Law that are not in conflict with the provisions relating to limited community redevelopment authorities and that are necessary or convenient to carry out the powers expressly conferred upon limited community redevelopment authorities shall apply to limited community redevelopment authorities.
